action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of 5 rows and 5 columns. The first and last rows have X's in the first, second, fourth, and fifth columns, with a blank space in the third column. The second row has X's in the first and fifth columns, with blank spaces in the second, third, and fourth columns. The third row has blank spaces in all columns. The fourth and fifth rows are identical to the first and last rows, respectively.
